content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I have your name, please, so I can better assist you?
Uh, it’s Linda... Do you need my full name?
Thank you, Linda! Could you please provide your home address so I can check if we service your location?
It’s 123 Maple Street, I think? Wait, or is it Maple Lane… Sorry, I always get those mixed up.
Thank you, Linda! I’ll check if we service your area. One moment, please.
reason: Could not determine service area due to a system error.

content: Hi Linda, this is Judy from XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help! Could you please confirm whether it’s Maple Street or Maple Lane, and let me know your zip code as well? I want to make sure we have your location correct.
Oh, sorry for the wait. It’s Maple Street for sure, and the zip is 44820. I hope that helps.
Thank you, Linda! I’ve confirmed you are in our service area. What kind of issue are you experiencing—plumbing, electrical, or heating and cooling (HVAC)?
It’s something electrical… My living room lights flicker a lot.
Thank you, Linda. We can help with that. When would be a good time for a technician to come by? Do you prefer mornings or afternoons?
Afternoons work better for me. Maybe this Thursday?

We have availability this Thursday afternoon. I’ve scheduled your appointment. Our technician will visit on Thursday between 1 and 4 PM. You’ll receive a reminder the day before. If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this message.
